mapper.select: select o.ord_code, o.created_date, v.vdr_name, v.vdr_code, o.req_dlv_date, o.tot_price, v.credit_price, v.credit_bal_price, o.pay_method, o.status, v.discount from orders o JOIN vender v ON o.vdr_code=v.vdr_code

SELECT od.ord_dtl_code, od.item_code, i.name, i.price, od.quantity, od.sup_price, od.vat_price, od.tot_price, od.disc_price FROM ordersDetail od left JOIN item i on od.item_code=i.item_code JOIN orders o on o.ord_code=od.ord_code JOIN vender v on o.vdr_code=v.vdr_code WHERE od.ord_code=#{ordCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(ORD_CODE, VDR_CODE, STATUS, CREATED_DATE, PAY_METHOD, TOT_QUANTITY, REQ_DLV_DATE, EMP_ID, COM_ID, TOT_SUP_PRICE, TOT_VAT_PRICE, TOT_DISC, DISCOUNT, TOT_PRICE, QUO_CODE) values(getNextOrdCode(), #{vdrCode}, #{status}, #{createdDate}, #{payMethod}, #{totQuantity}, #{reqDlvDate}, #{empId}, #{comId}, #{totSupPrice}, #{totVatPrice}, #{totDisc}, #{discount}, #{totPrice}, 'quoCode')

INSERT INTO ordersdetail ( ORD_DTL_CODE, ITEM_CODE, QUANTITY, SUP_PRICE, VAT_PRICE, DISC_PRICE, TOT_PRICE, COM_ID, ORD_CODE ) VALUES ( getNextOrdDtlCode(), #{itemCode}, #{quantity}, #{supPrice}, #{vatPrice}, #{discPrice}, #{totPrice}, #{comId}, getNextOrdCode() )
